name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Route AZKi 3D Acoustic LIVE 「Route If」アルバムリリース記念ライブ【#ルートAZKiライブ】 [0NXvBO1E6fM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Endroll wa Owaranai'.

subtitles.original: いざ三千里 これが生き様だと呼べるなら
subtitles.english: If I can call this way of life a journey of three thousand miles...

subtitles.original: 目的地なんてない 僕らは生きている
subtitles.english: There's no destination, but we are alive.

subtitles.original: 何度願い 何度滲み
subtitles.english: How many times have I wished, how many times have I wept,

subtitles.original: 何度怒り 何度嘘をついてしまったんだ
subtitles.english: how many times have I been angry, and how many times have I lied?

subtitles.original: こんな見窄らしくて 恥ずかしくて
subtitles.english: So shabby and shameful...

subtitles.original: 真面目すぎる僕を 隠さずに晒すよ
subtitles.english: I'll expose my overly serious self without hiding.

subtitles.original: ずっと誰にも言えないこの気持ちを
subtitles.english: These feelings I've never been able to tell anyone...

subtitles.original: 吐き出してしまいたい
subtitles.english: I want to spit them all out.

subtitles.original: 君を傷つけてしまって
subtitles.english: I ended up hurting you.

subtitles.original: 初めて夢を描いた時から
subtitles.english: Since the time I first envisioned a dream,

subtitles.original: もう何年経った？
subtitles.english: how many years have passed?

subtitles.original: 気づいたらみんな いなくなっていた
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, everyone was gone.

subtitles.original: 僕らは出会いと別れを繰り返していく
subtitles.english: We keep repeating encounters and partings.

subtitles.original: ただ時間が過ぎて 終わりが来る
subtitles.english: Time simply passes, and the end comes.

subtitles.original: これでいい 後悔は後は自分で決めるだけだ
subtitles.english: This is fine. I'll decide my regrets for myself.

subtitles.original: 綺麗で歪な想い出を歌にしよう
subtitles.english: Let's turn beautiful and distorted memories into a song.

subtitles.original: 何回でも そう何回でも届けよう
subtitles.english: No matter how many times, yes, no matter how many times, I'll deliver it.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 藍彩 - Aisai - / AZKi
subtitles.english: 藍彩 - Aisai - / AZKi

subtitles.original: 指をすり抜けて
subtitles.english: Slipping through my fingers...

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲・編曲：Keeno
subtitles.english: Lyrics, Music, Arrangement: Keeno

subtitles.original: やっと君を閉じ込めたのに
subtitles.english: Even though I finally managed to lock you away.

subtitles.original: 繰り返してる呼吸に混ざって
subtitles.english: Mixing with my repetitive breaths,

subtitles.original: 少しずつ零れてしまいそうで
subtitles.english: it feels like it's about to spill out bit by bit.

subtitles.original: いっそこのまま 誰にも届かない
subtitles.english: I'd rather just, as I am now, unreachable by anyone,

subtitles.original: 深い夜の底で息を止めて
subtitles.english: hold my breath at the bottom of the deep night...

subtitles.original: しまいたい
subtitles.english: ...and end it all.

subtitles.original: どくん、どくんと 涙の代わりに
subtitles.english: Thump, thump... instead of tears,

subtitles.original: 悲しくなるほど 音立てる心臓
subtitles.english: my heart beats so loudly it makes me sad.

subtitles.original: 分かっているの 分かっているのだけど
subtitles.english: I know. I know, but...

subtitles.original: まだこんなにも 君をただこんなにも
subtitles.english: still so much, I just, so much for you...

subtitles.original: 口を噤んで 膝を抱えて
subtitles.english: With my mouth shut, holding my knees,

subtitles.original: そろそろ泣いてもいいですか
subtitles.english: is it okay if I cry soon?

subtitles.original: 繰り返す幕の 行き着く先まで
subtitles.english: Until the very end of these repeating acts,

subtitles.original: 私の全部に君がいた
subtitles.english: you were in everything of mine.

subtitles.original: もう二度と君に 触れられないこんな
subtitles.english: If this is a body that can never...

subtitles.original: 身体なら意味はなくて
subtitles.english: ...touch you again, it has no meaning.

subtitles.original: 今すぐにでも脱ぎ捨てて
subtitles.english: I want to cast it off right now...

subtitles.original: しまいたいのに
subtitles.english: ...and be done with it, but...

subtitles.original: もがいてもどうしようもなくて
subtitles.english: no matter how I struggle, it's hopeless.

subtitles.original: 酷く膿んだこの傷を 掻き毟っている
subtitles.english: I'm scratching at this terribly festered wound.

subtitles.original: いっそこのまま 私にはいらない
subtitles.english: I'd rather just, as I am now, I don't need it.

subtitles.original: 暗い夜の底で息をしてる
subtitles.english: I'm breathing at the bottom of the dark night.

subtitles.original: 明日なんて このまま泣いて
subtitles.english: Forget about tomorrow; if I just keep crying like this...

subtitles.original: 全部溢れたら 君を知らない
subtitles.english: ...and everything overflows, will I be able to become...

subtitles.original: 私になれるのかな
subtitles.english: ...a version of myself that doesn't know you?

subtitles.original: どくん、どくんと 涙が枯れても
subtitles.english: Thump, thump... even if my tears run dry,

subtitles.original: この身体中を 巡る焼けるような赤
subtitles.english: this burning red circulates through my body.

subtitles.original: 分かっているの 分かっているのだけど
subtitles.english: I know. I know, but...

subtitles.original: これじゃあまりにも この恋があまりにも
subtitles.english: This is just too much. This love is just too much.

subtitles.original: まだこんなにも 君をただこんなにも
subtitles.english: Still so much, I just, so much for you...
